ECC CTRL

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x10
Size:
0x4

Description

ECC component control register type definition

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:4] - - - -
[3] PCR_SIGN w 0x0 -
[2] ZEROIZE w 0x0 -
[1:0] CTRL w 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

PCR_SIGN

Run PCR Signing flow: Run ECC Signing flow to sign PCRs.

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.reset_b

ZEROIZE

Zeroize all internal registers: Zeroize all internal registers after ECC process, to avoid SCA leakage.
Software write generates only a single-cycle pulse on the hardware interface and then will be erased

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.reset_b

CTRL

Control command field: This can be:
00 for NONE
01 for KEYGEN
10 for SIGNING
11 for VERIFYING
After each software write, hardware will erase the register

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.reset_b
